text: Someo is a village and former municipality of the district of Vallemaggia in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 4 April 2004 the former municipalities of Aurigeno, Coglio, Giumaglio, Lodano, Moghegno and Someo to form a new and larger municipality of Maggia. The municipality has 258 people in 2003. It has an area of 32.73 kmÂ². Category:2004 disestablishments in Switzerland Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:Villages in Ticino
title: Someo
